goal:
IDEXX Laboratories, Inc. is a innovative global organization engaged in the development, manufacture, and distribution of products and services for water testing, dairy, the companion animal veterinary, livestock and poultry. Founded in 1983 with headquarters in Westbrook, Maine, and EMEA in Hoofddorp, Netherlands, IDEXX offers products to customers in over 175 countries around the world and employs over 8,000 people in full-and part-time positions.

IDEXX is committed to sustainability. The human condition is a very important element which defines the way IDEXX conducts its business relations that is socially and environmentally responsible. Corporate responsibility is embedded into IDEXX Purpose and Guiding Principles.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
